cast.name: 马科斯·罗德里格斯 Marcos Rodríguez
奥巴·巴巴图德 Obba Babatundé
康拉德·格洛弗 Conrad Glover

writer.name: 康拉德·格洛弗 Conrad Glover

director.name: 康拉德·格洛弗 Conrad Glover

introduction: A bloody tale of an underground mafia crew that rose to power in a volatile world while building a criminal empire in the heart of New Jersey and surrounding New York areas. As the crew prepares for a hostile takeover, survival pf the fittest in a deadly never ending war zone results in a head to head showdown with one of the most ruthless Mexican drug cartels east of the border. All the while, another deadly mafia crew out for blood, threatens the remaining territory. To make matters even worst, Undercover FBI investigators move in to try to infiltrate the organizations. As time passes with an abundance of money in circulation, the death toll continued to climb at an all time high and the ultimate betrayal sets in. This suspenseful cat and mouse chase is based on a true story. Never before has there been a mafia story that's been so riveting and captivating. But as the saying goes, every great empire always takes a fall in the end
